main event: Three male civilians reported observing a gray spherical object with a deep orange tail in the sky near Washington, Indiana on April 1, 1952.
interesting points: The observation lasted for about 3 minutes., The object was first seen near the setting sun., The object changed color to match the sky as it moved., Witnesses reported that the object appeared to be very high, around 10 miles., An Air Force pilot also reported seeing a similar object around the same time.
sighted object: a gray spherical object with a deep orange tail
